Metric Description: This is the description of the metric as pointed to by the measurementMethod
measurementValue: Use this if the thing you are recording is an integer or a float.
measurementUnit: percentage or count or SI units
fullName: Class:Person. The name of the person who either carried out the measurement or was responsible for calculating the statistic.
column13: Use this if the thing you are recording is not a number.
column14: Reported if done by a human eyeball; Calcluated if extracted in an automated way. The human is recorded in fullname.

Metric Description: The total number of specimens and/or items. If the metric is attached to an object group then the count is of the collection being described. If the metric is attached to the Institution then it is the overall count for that institution.
The percentage of the whole collection being described that is digitized [define digitized]. Could be used in combination with the object count metric.
An actual number of digitized records in the collection being described [define digitized]
The percentage of the collection described in the record that has an image. Could be used in combination with the object count metric.
An actual number of digitized records with images
The percentage of the collection described in the record that has verified Lat Lon coordinates. Could be used in combination with the object count metric.
The actual number of records that have verified Lat Lon coordinates
Count of the taxa at the rank indicated in measurementFactText. Do not abbreviate the rank.
The cubic volume of the record (Institutional or Collection). Could be used in combination with the object count metric.
The area of the record (Institutional or Collection). Could be used in combination with the object count metric.
